00016 package pl.mg6.android.maps.extensions.utils;
00017 
00018 public final class SphericalMercator {
00019 
00020         private static final double MIN_LATITUDE = -85.0511287798;
00021         private static final double MAX_LATITUDE = 85.0511287798;
00022 
00023         private SphericalMercator() {
00024         }
00025 
00026         public static double fromLatitude(double latitude) {
00027                 double radians = Math.toRadians(latitude + 90) / 2;
00028                 return Math.toDegrees(Math.log(Math.tan(radians)));
00029         }
00030 
00031         public static double toLatitude(double mercator) {
00032                 double radians = Math.atan(Math.exp(Math.toRadians(mercator)));
00033                 return Math.toDegrees(2 * radians) - 90;
00034         }
00035 
00041         public static double scaleLatitude(double latitude) {
00042                 if (latitude < MIN_LATITUDE) {
00043                         latitude = MIN_LATITUDE;
00044                 } else if (latitude > MAX_LATITUDE) {
00045                         latitude = MAX_LATITUDE;
00046                 }
00047                 return fromLatitude(latitude) + 180.0;
00048         }
00049 
00055         public static double scaleLongitude(double longitude) {
00056                 return longitude + 180.0;
00057         }
00058 }
